person.persName: Waitsville Perryman (Adair County, Kentucky, student, day laborer, and soldier (13 KY Inf))

body.p: Adair County, Kentucky, student, day laborer, and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of William Perryman and Sabrina Perryman. Married to Nancy Blair Perryman in Adair County, Kentucky, in 1858. Father of Charlotte A. Perryman and Emily J. Perryman. Student in Russell County in 1850. Day laborer in Adair County in 1860. Served in the 13th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a second sergeant and a private from December 31, 1861 to January 12, 1865.
